description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

1.0.0.description:
This version contains all content within the Prologue of the game.
Let me know if you have any bugs or suggestions!
1.0.0.title: Version 1.0.0

2.0.0.description:
# Changelog
- **Added Content from Chapter 1.**
- Added missing Cards from Prologue that weren't in the Item list before. Whoops.
2.0.0.title: Version 2.0.0

3.0.0.description:
# Notes
This version was created the night before Demo 4 was released, and I'm noticing that some Items/Checks need to be corrected. This will likely be remedied in a minor update before the Demo 4 update to the Manual. Apologies for any confusion you may have looking for Checks that were moved/removed.

# Changelog
- Added Chapters 2 and 3.
- Added more Goal Options.
  - Prologue, Chapter 1, Chapter 2, and Chapter 3 are the possible Goals.
- Added all of the Consumables and Cards you can get as Items.
- Fixed some logic regarding Blackrock Castle access.
- Probably some more fixes that I now don't remember...
3.0.0.title: Version 3.0.0

3.0.1.description:
# Changelog
- Added a Check for the Bomb outside of Roblox HQ.
- Fixed some of the Bizville Categories to be more like the rest of the Manual's.
- Made it so the Worm Consumable will be Filler if Fishsanity is disabled.
3.0.1.title: Version 3.0.1

4.0.0-RC1.description:
# Changelog
- **Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity are now COMPLETED. They will not have any more additions until Chapter 4 is added to the Manual.**
- **All non-Shopsanity Checks should now have a Category saying what room they're located in.**
- Added a couple of Checks that were missed in the past. Oops.
- Maybe some other fixes idk
- Hotfix: Fixed there being two instances of the `Moss` Chatsanity location. They're now renamed based on their location.
- Hotfix 2: Aaaand it happened with `Dave` too, great...Oh, and fixed some other major generating issues too.
  - This is the 5th time this same issue has happened and flown under my radar.
4.0.0-RC1.title: Version 4.0.0 RC1

4.0.0-RC2.description:
# Changelog
- **This Manual is now compatible with 0.6.2+ of Archipelago.**
- **Added I Spy Logic to some of the more hidden BUX.**
- Fixed the names of two Checks in the BUX shop since the Cards were changed in Demo 4.
  - Also added a 3rd Resurrect Card to the pool to accommodate for this.
- **Maybe fixed all of the big logic issues?**
  - <sub>If there's still issues, please let me know so I can fix them ;-;</sub>
4.0.0-RC2.title: Version 4.0.0 RC2

4.0.0-RC3r2.description:
<sub>I pray this game still generates successfully since I'm currently too busy to make sure of it ;-;</sub>
# Changelog
- Added an Option to enable or disable the BUX Shop Checks being hinted at the start of the Multiworld.
  - And then uploaded a hotfix to fix the Option not doing what was intended, oops.
  - Uploaded another hotfix because of the new Option not working.
  - And another hotfix because of 0.6.3 causing it to break, THANKS ARCHIPELAGO.
4.0.0-RC3r2.title: Version 4.0.0 RC3

4.0.0r3.description:
Finally, it's ready!
<sub>I hope...</sub>
Sorry for keeping you waiting! Prepare yourself, this one is a big one!

# Known Issues
None for now.
# Changelog (since last stable release, major updates are in **bold**)
- **This Manual should now be compatible with 0.6.3+ of Archipelago.**
- **Added Pre-Prologue Content.**
  - The battle against the Noob and Helmet Noob doesn't require the Superball, but all later fights technically do. It's just done this way so you can get through the full Tutorial area without having to stop in the middle of it awkwardly.
  - The Noob and Helmet Noob enemy Checks were moved to the Pre-Prologue since you technically now fight them there first.
- **Added Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity.**
- **Added the Disable Post-Goal Content Option.**
- **Added a Goal for beating The Pit.**
- Moved `Snory Bear` Check to the Caves since you find one there first (if fighting every enemy you encounter, which logic mostly assumes you do).
- Renamed the `Ice Storm Past Snowy Bear` Check because Snory Bear is the enemy's name, not Snowy Bear.
- Moved the Banished Knight fight Check from the Enemies section to the Bosses section. Oops.
- Gave the Jeep Minigame Check a currently hidden `Minigames` Category. May or may not be used more in the future, depending on what the game adds.
- Renamed `Mango After Defeating Bigfoot X` Checks to `Mango X From Bigfoot's Tree`.
- Renamed the BUX Item's Category from Shopsanity to Shopsanity Currency, and made sure they will still be removed if Shopsanity is disabled.
- **Added Chapter-based Categories to most of the Checks, excluding Shopsanity.**
- Gave the VLAD Enemy the Enemies Category that it should've already had.
- Changed the Swords to be Useful Items for now (if they weren't already, I forget if I did).
- Added a new Trap Item and Shopsanity Check for the new Tick Tock Card.
- Added an Item for the new Infect card that replaced one of the Charge Cards in Chapter 2.
- **Added Chapter-based Categories to Cards and other Items.**
  - This is so that any Cards or other Items past your Goal will be removed if Disable Post-Goal Content is enabled.
- Added a Check (and Item) for a Happy HP Card found in Chapter 1 that I didn't know existed. (Thank you, @Xenophane12!)
- **Added Solo Mode, which removes some Cards and other Items if enabled.**
  - Recommended to enable if you plan to play the game on your own for the Multiworld, rather than with friends.
- Added Checks in Roadtown for the Cookie and Gros' Apple Pie.
- Added Check for Red Pepper in Plains.
- Added Check for Turitopulis Apple Pie from Gemi.
- **Superball is now logically needed for battles, and Ball is now logically needed for the overworld.**
  - Because of this, you need Superball to go past Bizville and into Roblox HQ onward, and then you'll need Ball to go through part of Caves onward.
- Renamed `BUX with Fire Ants` Check in the Caves to `BUX with Fire Ants in Caves`. Just because.
- **Added I Spy Logic to some of the more hidden BUX, requiring you to logically have I Spy to get them.**
- Fixed the names of two Checks in the BUX shop since the Cards were changed in Demo 4.
  - Also added a 3rd Resurrect Card to the pool to accommodate for this.
- **Added an Option to enable or disable the BUX Shop Checks being hinted at the start of the Multiworld.**
- Probably some fixes and small things I've forgotten that aren't part of this list.

Once Demo 5 releases, I'll probably play it once or twice before beginning to work on Version 5.0.0, which should hopefully include Chapter 4 and possibly Chapter 5.

- Hotfix 1: Fixed the Bigfoot Check having the incorrect Category assigned to it.
- Hotfix 2: Fixed generation failures occurring on earlier Goals with Post-Goal Content disabled.
4.0.0r3.title: Version 4.0.0

4.0.1.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Made it so no traps show up if `filler_traps` is set to 0.
- Added a tiny, unimportant secret if a player enables Chatsanity. I won't _spoil_ it, go find it yourself if you're that curious...
4.0.1.title: Version 4.0.1

4.0.2.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Made a couple logic adjustments to fix some Checks causing generation failures under certain conditions (had to do with the same issue that was happening in #64).
- Made the Player's name be written if they trigger one of the intentional OptionError's, making it clearer which player needs to change their YAML for conveinence.
- Update: Added the Manual's files to GitHub for anyone who wishes to make PR's (Pull Requests) or overall assist with the Manual's development.
4.0.2.title: Version 4.0.2

4.1.0.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- **Changed some MAJOR issues with the linear logic flow due to a mistake on my part when previously deprecating some problematic uses of `{canReachLocation()}`.**
- **Added a new Option specifically for the BUX Shop Checks.**
- Added the Manual's files to GitHub for anyone who wishes to make PR's (Pull Requests) or overall assist with the Manual's development.
4.1.0.title: Version 4.1.0

4.1.1.description:
# Known Issues
On more restrictive YAMLs, there's a non-zero chance that generation will fail to place all of the items. I'm currently unsure why this has a chance to happen, but it's a low enough chance that if you encounter this and re-gen, you should be okay.
# Changelog
- **Fixed Chapter 2 onward not having Bomb as part of their logic.**
  - This caused players to have to fight off the Spiky Killbot without the intended solution to proceed to those Chapters.
- Patched up some missing logic in some Roblox HQ and Bizville Checks (primarily those at the start of Chapter 3).
- Fixed the logic for the Dust Check, as you don't *need* to get the Spider before obtaining it.
- Fixed the logic for another Check or two.

Feel free to check the code on GitHub and let me know if you see any other logical issues that need to be ironed out, as there could be more that I missed!
4.1.1.title: Version 4.1.1

4.1.2.description:
# Known Issues
- None for now...
# Changelog
- Fixed the logic of the two Chapter 1 Cutscenes related to fighting the Cruel King. (Reported by @Studmuffin2227)
# Things to Add
- #18: Add all of the content within Chapter 4. This is on hold until the Chapter 5 + Story Rewrite Update releases sometime in the coming months.
4.1.2.title: Version 4.1.2

4.2.0.description:
# Known Issues
- Same generation issue that's plagued this game for a while. Read below for details.
-  #69: Big Fire Ant Check in Chatsanity is barely in the wrong room. My bad. Logically doesn't make a difference, so will probably fix in a later update.
# Changelog
- **The game no longer intentionally fails generation if Disable PostGoal Content is on when your Goal is set to The Pit.**
  - This was being done as a safety measure, but shouldn't be needed anymore.
- Adjusted some hooks related to changing Item classifications and disabling Categories of Items/Checks based on Options.
- Changed the 50 BUX from `Progression` to `Progression (Skip Balancing)`.
  - Also made them get removed from the item pool if the BUX Shop is disabled.
- **Made the Cards found in the BUX Shop have the Chapter 1 Category instead of Prologue, since Prologue disables the BUX Shop anyway.**
- **Made Shopsanity and Cutscenesanity _not_ Options anymore, to make the Manual have more consistent successful generation.**
  - The BUX Shop is still its own Option, however.
  - The generator still has a low chance of failing due to it trying to nicely fit all of the Progression Items before they're needed. Linear games always seem to have this issue, and I'm doing everything I can to fix it, but I genuinely have no idea how to permanently fix it without using something lame like `place_item`.
- Fixed Bomb not being part of Blackrock Castle Region's logic, which may have caused some linear issues. <sub>whoops</sub>
- Added comments explaining some of the code in `hooks/World.py`, for those curious.
- Maybe more that I forgot, I dunno...
# Things to Add
- #18: Add all of the content within Chapter 4. This is on hold until the Chapter 5 + Story Rewrite Update releases sometime in the coming months.
- #68 and #70: Add a couple of missing Chatsanity Checks. Probably gonna wait on this until the next _major_ update since it's somewhat minimal.
4.2.0.title: Version 4.2.0

pre-4.0.0-1.description:
# This is a pre-release version. Due to this, I encourage you to make me aware of any suggestions you have or any bugs that you find!

# Changelog
- Added Pre-Prologue Content.
  - It's just one Check without Chatsanity or Cutscenesanity, though...  
  - The battle against the Noob and Helmet Noob doesn't require the Ball and Superball, but all later fights technically do. It's just done this way so you can get through the full Tutorial area without having to stop in the middle of it awkwardly.
  - The Noob and Helmet Noob enemy Checks were moved to the Pre-Prologue since you technically now fight them there first.
- **Added Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity.**
  - Currently only for Pre-Prologue and the very start of Prologue.
pre-4.0.0-1.title: Version pre-4.0.0-1

pre-4.0.0-2.description:
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- **Added the Disable PostGoal Content Option.**
  - Because it's not 100% completed and some logic checks for if a Chapter is completed to see if the Check is in logic, **only Chapter 3 and The Pit are working Goal conditions until all the Chapter logic is finished**.
- **Added a Goal for beating The Pit.**
- Moved Snory Bear Check to the Caves.
- Renamed the Ice Storm Past Snowy Bear Check because *Snory* Bear is the enemy's name, not *Snowy* Bear.
- Moved the Banished Knight fight Check from the Enemies section to the Bosses section.
- Filled in some more of the Prologue Chatsanity, but it still isn't finished yet.
- Hid the Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity Categories since they don't need an entire Category to themselves in the Manual Client.
- Gave the Jeep Minigame Check a hidden Minigames Category. May or may not be used more in the future, depending on what the game adds.
- Renamed `Mango After Defeating Bigfoot X` Checks to `Mango X From Bigfoot's Tree`.
- Renamed the BUX Item's Category from `Shopsanity` to `Shopsanity Currency`, and made sure they will still be removed if Shopsanity is disabled.
- There is a Skeleton Enemy as well as a Skeleton NPC. This caused generation failures from having the same Check name, so they've been slightly renamed to differentiate the two.
- Fixed generation issue regarding renaming the `Wooden Sword from Shedletsky` Check to `Wooden Sword`.
pre-4.0.0-2.title: Version pre-4.0.0-2

pre-4.0.0-3.description:
# Changelog
- Added Chapter-based Categories to more of the Checks, as well as the Progression Items. I think all that's left is most of the non-Progression Items, as well as Pre-Prologue and Prologue's Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity.
  - **All Goals should finally work now?** Let me know if any gen issues happen!
- Gave the VLAD Enemy the Enemies Category that it should've already had.
- Added a previously missing colon to the Items and Checks pertaining to the "Call" set of Cards since it's part of the Card's name.
- Changed the Swords to be Useful Items for now.
- Added a new Trap Item and Shopsanity Check for the new Tick Tock Card.
pre-4.0.0-3.title: Version pre-4.0.0-3

pre-4.0.0-3a.description:
# Changelog
- Fixed major logic issues regarding Plains, Turitopulis, Rainforest, and Telamon's Manor.
- Finished adding Chapter-based Categories to currently existing Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity.
- Fishsanity should be working as intended again.
- Added an Item for the new Infect card that replaced one of the Charge Cards in Chapter 2.
- Added Chapter-based Categories to Cards. Still gotta add it to Items.
- Added a Check (and Item) for a Happy HP Card found in Chapter 1 that I didn't know existed. (Thank you, @Xenophane12!)
pre-4.0.0-3a.title: Version pre-4.0.0-3a

pre-4.0.0-4.description:
# Changelog
- Finished adding Chapter-based Categories to the Items.
- Added Solo Mode.
- Added Checks in Roadtown for the Cookie and Gros' Apple Pie.
- Added Check for Red Pepper in Plains.
- Added Check for Turitopulis Apple Pie from Gemi.
pre-4.0.0-4.title: Version pre-4.0.0-4

pre-4.0.0-5.description:
# Changelog
- Filled in more of Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity, up to Sentient Statue in Blackrock Castle.
- Renamed all instances of `Important Things` to `Key Items` since they got renamed in Demo 4.
- Added a missing Check for when Shedletsky gives you the Train Ticket at the start of Chapter 3. Not sure how I missed that one.
- Added an extra Option...
- Hotfix: Removed duplicate Ryan Check preventing generation.
- Hotfix 2: Fixed `Power Stab + Using Cards Tutorial Cutscene` Check having the incorrect logic.
- Hotfix 3: Fixed logic for the Cutscenes on the Roblox HQ Balcony in Prologue.
- Hotfix 4 (How many of these are there going to be...): Fixed logic for HQ Basement Checks.
- Hotfix 5: **Fixed multiple Options not working as intended due to a minor code typo (using `==` when I was supposed to use `=`).**
pre-4.0.0-5.title: Version pre-4.0.0-5

pre-4.0.0-6.description:
# Changelog
- **Added Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity up to the Plains in Chapter 2.**
- **Updated Room-based Categories. They now apply up to the Plains in Chapter 2.**
- Added another new setting that's Chatsanity-related. Take a peek into the YAML and I'm sure you'll see it.
- Maybe some other fixes that I've forgotten?
- Hotfix: Updated Check numbers for Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity in the YAML.
pre-4.0.0-6.title: Version pre-4.0.0-6

pre-4.0.0-7.description:
# Changelog
- **Superball is now logically needed for battles, and Ball is now logically needed for the overworld.**
  - Because of this, you need Superball to go past Bizville and into Roblox HQ onward, and then you'll need Ball to go through part of Caves onward.
- **Added more of Chatsanity and Cutscenesanity. It now has all of Chapter 2 and some of Chapter 3. I implemented the Train and the first room of Spooksville.**
- Renamed `BUX with Fire Ants` Check in the Caves to `BUX with Fire Ants in Caves`. Just because.
- Had to rename a couple of Checks due to NPCs sharing names with Enemies.
- **All of Chapter 2's Checks should now have their respective room-specific Categories.**
- Probably some other minor things I've forgotten about by now, oops
- Fun Fact: We've now hit 1k+ Checks, 10k+ lines in the `locations.json` file, and said file is over 1/5 of a megabyte (200 kilobytes)—just some cool numbers for you.
- Hotfix: Slightly adjusted the Options to reflect how many Checks they comprise of again.
- Hotfix 2: Removed duplicate Friendly Rat Check.
pre-4.0.0-7.title: Version pre-4.0.0-7
